text: Answer: 75 Solution: Cache hit rate = Probability of finding the entry in the cache * Probability of reading valid bitas 1 = 0.9 * (1-p) = 0.9 - 0.9p Cache miss rate = 1 - Cache hit rate = 0.1 + 0.9p Effective Access Time = (0.9 - 0.9p) * 10 + (0.1 + 0.9p) * (10 + 40) = 41 =>p=0.75 or 75% Correct answer is 75
